overview:
Paul Neto co-founded audience segmentation and targeting company Crowd Science with John Martin and John Wainwright. He currently serves as the Crowd Science VP of Research & Operations.

Paul spent a number of years designing, supporting and consulting in the ï¬eld of geographic information systems, including internet mapping technologies and international boundary delineation. After a short stint in market research, Paul led a technology and operations team at comScore and worked hand-in-hand with research and sales teams conducting various types of online research, including customer satisfaction and advertising effectiveness, on some of the companyâ€™s biggest accounts.
